text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Do you Nicki, have the courage to stand up to Trump??? Can you put on a mask? Can you bring back Fauci? Will you stand behind Trump when he lets thousands die with the Covid19, when he doesn’t try to lower the #s with the virus? Will you stand up when Trump endangers our children
